General.Name: DL E&C Co Ltd
General.Description: DL E&C Co.,Ltd., a construction company, provides engineering, procurement, and construction solutions in South Korea and internationally. The company undertakes various plant works in refinery/gas, petrochemical, energy, industrial facilities, and environment; and civil engineering works in road/bridge, road/port/water resources, and railroad/metro/tunnel. It constructs office/commercial properties, cultural/sports properties, hotel/resort, education/healthcare properties, and logistics centers; and offers housing facilities, which include apartments and residential and commercial development; and redevelopment, reconstruction, and remodeling services. DL E&C Co.,Ltd. was incorporated in 1939 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.
General.Address: Donuimun, Center Point D Tower, Seoul, South Korea, 03181
